CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 11, 1959, pg. 1, reads: "As Pittsburgh Played Host to the All-Stars - Big Bats - Four of the most feared hitters in National League had a chance to discuss batting tips before the All-Star game at Forbes Field Tuesday. Left to right are Stan Musial, Cardinals; Hank Aaron, Milwaukee; Willie Mays, Giants, and Wally Moon, Dodgers.  Moon, Mays and Aaron made up the National League outfield for the entire game. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Baseball players Stan Musial of St. Louis Cardinals, Hank Aaron of Milwaukee Braves, Willie Mays of San Francisco Giants, and Wally Moon of Los Angeles Dodgers posing with bats for 1959 All Star Game at Forbes Field
